response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to revolutionize its industry. This product not only embodies cutting-edge technology but also offers unparalleled benefits that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and innovative features, we believe it's worth more than a million dollars to us. We are offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your business or lifestyle.", "product_price": 950000}
